resources.string:
MaterialOS is a place for all designers to contribute their Material Design or Material Inspired icons for others to use. We make the icons available in as many formats as possible including all available vectors, showcases, and icon packs, such as this one.


Icons released under the CC BY 4.0 license. 

Check out the full list of contributors at the website.
Modified and built the MaterialOS dashboard on top of Paperboard.
Jahir Fiquitiva\n(Collaborators: Aidan Follestad and Joaquin Cuitiño)

This dashboard is built on PaperBoard, an open source icon pack dashboard template.


Licensed under the CC BY-SA 4.0 License 
Copyright 2015
Floating Action Button is yet another library for drawing Material Design promoted actions. \n\nLicensed under the Apache 2.0 License.
Material Dialogs is a beautiful, easy-to-use, and customizable dialogs API, enabling you to use Material designed dialogs down to API 8. \n\nLicensed under the MIT License.
PkRequestManager is a helpful, yet simple, tool which makes it easy to load and send application icon requests for Android. \n\nLicensed under the MIT License.
Picasso is a powerful image downloading and caching library for Android. \n\nLicensed under the Apache 2.0 License.
OkHttp is an HTTP and SPDY client for Android and Java applications. \n\nLicensed under the Apache 2.0 License.
The MaterialDrawer library aims to provide the easiest possible implementation of a navigation drawer for your application. \n\nLicensed under the Apache 2.0 License.
